posts.post_title: Mayo Cut Plug McCarthy Boston SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bob C
Solid VG+ example with tremendous eye appeal. Light scotch tape stain on back but no paper loss. One of the more difficult players in the set. I have not sent in to be slabbed but I do believe it will grade. Satisfaction guaranteed. SOLD
Thanks!
